channel.title: Mdl on Hugo中文文档
channel.description: Recent content in Mdl on Hugo中文文档

item.description: HugoMDL HugoMDL is a multipage responsibe blog/portfolio theme for Hugo. The theme is based on the Material Design Lite sample blog layout. At present it suits my needs, but feel free to help improve this theme by forking a copy and submitting a pull request. Installation Inside the folder of your Hugo site run: $ mkdir themes $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/jchatkinson/HugoMDL For more information read the official setup guide of Hugo.
